text: This is a list of college women's soccer coaches with 300 wins. Anson Dorrance of North Carolina is the all-time leader in both wins and winning percentage with a record of 826–70–38 (). ==College women's soccer coaches with 300 wins== ===Key=== {| class="wikitable" |- |* |Active coach in 2017 |- |‡ |Inducted into the National Soccer Hall of Fame |- | bgcolor=#FFE5B4| | The list includes coaches with 300 wins regardless of division.
